paragraphs.1: In July 2025, we came together to use our professional skills for a social project. We believe that the Adoptly platform will make pet adoption simple, transparent, and accessible.
paragraphs.2: The core team was formed on the Team Challenge platform – where engineers, designers, QA, and managers find partners for their first meaningful projects.
